{\dictmeaning{

\hypertarget{time (1)1b}{}
\alnum{b} \eng{(Time)} (keYyalilx kuDugoVlu, maraLu gaDiyAra
hiDidiruvaMte citirxsalAda) kAlpuruSa. 
\num{2} (vishiSaTx GaTnAvaLi,
saninxveVshagaLu, \mo vakekx saMbaMdhisida) kAlAvadhi; yuga: 
\eng{the times of the Mughals} mogalf doregaLa kAl. 
\num{3} hotutx; samaya; veVLe; biDuvu; purusotutx: \eng{had no time
 to discuss it} adanunx caciRsalu samayaviralillx.
\num{4} (vayxkitxya)
jiVvAvadhi; jiVvita kAl; jiVvamAna: \eng{will last my time}
adu nananx jiVvamAnada tanaka bALutatxde, nananx jiVvAvadhige
sAkAgutatxde. 
\num{5} (\AmA) jeYlushikeSx; seremanevAsa(da shikeSx): \eng{he
 is doing time} avanu jeYlushikeSx anuBavisutitxdAdxne. 
\num{6} kalikekAl; aBAyxsAvadhi; kelsa \mo vanunx
kaliyuva kAl, avadhi: \eng{he served his time in the army}
avanu seYnayxdalilx kalikeya kAl kaLeda. 
\num{7} 
\alnum{a}
muSiTxkALagada sutitxna nigadita--avadhi, samaya: \eng{the referee
 cried: `the time is up' `} veVLe
Ayitu' eMdu tiVpuRgAra odarida. 

\alnum{b} pAnagaqhada mucucxva
veVLe: \eng{`the time is up' cried the landlord}
pAnagaqhada yajmAna (kuDitada) `veVLe mugiyitu'
eMda. 
\num{8} (oMdu udedxVsha \mo vugaLige odagisida) nigadita veVLe;
nishicxta kAl: \eng{there is a time for everything}
ellxdakUkx oMdu niyamita kAlvide. \eng{now is the time}
idiVga sakAl(vAgide). 
\num{9} gaBARvadhi; gaBaR dharisiruva kAl:
